sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-container>
    <v-form  @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
      <v-row>
        <v-col
        :cols="6">
          <v-select
            v-if="!editPortfolioName"
            :items="portfolios"
            item-text="name"
            return-object
            v-model="selectedPortfolio"
            outlined dense hide-details>
          </v-select>
          <v-text-field
            v-else
            :value="selectedPortfolio.name"
            @change="newPortfolioName = $event"
            dense outlined
            hide-details />
        </v-col>
        <v-col
        :cols="1" >
          <template v-if="selectedPortfolio.id && canEdit">
            <v-btn
              v-if="!editPortfolioName"
              color="green" icon
              @click="editPortfolioName = !editPortfolioName">
              <v-icon large>mdi-pencil-circle</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
            <v-btn
              v-else
              color="green" icon
              @click="updatePortfolioName()">
              <v-icon large>mdi-check-circle</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
          </template>
        </v-col>
        <v-col
        :cols="2">
          <AddPortfolioName
            :userID="user.id"
            @add-portfolio="addPortfolio"/>
        </v-col>
        <v-col :cols="2">
        <DeleteObj
          v-if="canEdit"
          :objectType="'model portfolio'"
          :objectToDelete="selectedPortfolio"
          @delete-object="deletePortfolio($event)"
        />
      </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <v-row dense>
        <v-col
        :cols="8">
          <v-card>
            <v-card-text>
              Description
            </v-card-text>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
        <v-col
          :cols="3">
          <v-card
          :color="checkColor()"
          :hint="checkHint()"
          persistent-hint>
            <v-card-text>
              Percentage
            </v-card-text>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
        <v-col
          :cols="1">
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <v-row
        v-for="investment in investments"
        :key="investment.id"
        dense>
        <v-col
          :cols="8">
            <v-autocomplete
              v-model="investment.investment_name"
              :items="investmentList"
              item-text="name"
              item-value="id"
              @change="addToChanged(investment)"
              outlined dense hide-details/>
        </v-col>
        <v-col
          :cols="3">
            <v-text-field
              type="number"
              :value = "getPercentage(investment)"
              @blur = "setPercentage($event.target.value, investment)"
              @change = "addToChanged(investment)"
              dense outlined hide-details/>
        </v-col>
        <v-col
          :cols="1">
          <DeleteObj
            v-if="canEdit"
            :objectType="'modelInvestment'"
            :objectToDelete="investment"
            :portfolioID="portfolioID"
            @delete-object="getInvestments()"
            v-on="$listeners"
          />
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <v-row
        dense
        v-if="canEdit">
        <v-col
          :cols="8">
          <v-autocomplete
            v-model="newInvestment.investment_name"
            :items="investmentList"
            item-text="name"
            item-value="id"
            outlined dense hide-details
            label="Add an investment by typing a name"/>
        </v-col>
        <v-col
          :cols="3">
            <v-text-field
              type="number"
              :value = "getPercentage(newInvestment)"
              @blur = "setPercentage($event.target.value, newInvestment)"
              outlined dense hide-details/>
        </v-col>
        <v-col
          :cols="1">
          <v-btn type="button" color="green" dark dense
            @click="addInvestment">
            <v-icon>
              mdi-plus
            </v-icon>
          </v-btn>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <v-row v-if="investments.length && canEdit">
        <v-col>
          <v-btn type="submit" color="primary" dark dense>Update All</v-btn>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-form>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
import AddPortfolioName from "@/components/AddPortfolioName.vue";
import DeleteObj from "@/components/DeleteObj.vue";

export default {
  name: "PortfolioTable",
  props: {
    portfolio: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
    },
    user: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      selectedPortfolio: {},
      investments: [],
      active: false,
      error: null,
      portfolios: [],
      changeList: [],
      investmentList: [],
      newInvestment: {},
      editPortfolioName: false,
      newPortfolioName: '',
    };
  },
  components: {
    DeleteObj,
    AddPortfolioName,
  },
  watch: {
    portfolio: function () {
      this.getInvestmentList();
      this.getInvestments();
    },
    selectedPortfolio: function () {
      this.getInvestmentList();
      this.getInvestments();
    },
  },
  computed: {
    portfolioID: function() {
      if (this.selectedPortfolio != null) {
        return this.selectedPortfolio.id;
      } else if (this.portfolio){
        return this.portfolio.id;
      } else {
        return null
      }
    },
    canEdit() {
      if (this.isPracticeAdmin && this.isNotPublic ) {
        return true
      } else {
        return false
      }
    },
    isPracticeAdmin() {
      if (this.selectedPortfolio.id) {
        if (this.selectedPortfolio.practices.length > 0) {
          return this.selectedPortfolio.practices.some(item => this.user.admin_practices.includes(item));
        } else {
          return true
        }
      } else {
        return true
      }
    },
    isNotPublic() {
      if (this.selectedPortfolio.id) {
        if (this.selectedPortfolio.allowed_users.length > 0) {
          return true;
        } else {
          return false;
        }
      } else {
        return false
      }
    },
  },
  methods: {
    checkHint() {
      if (!this.checkComplete()) {
        return "Allocations do not equal 100%"
      }
    },
    checkColor(){
      if (!this.checkComplete()) {
        return "red lighten-4"
      }
    },
    checkComplete() {
      let value = this.investments.reduce( function (a,b) {
        return a + Number(b.percentage);
      }, 0);
      if (value == 1) {
        return true
      } else {
        return false
      }
    },
    updatePortfolioName() {
      this.editPortfolioName = !this.editPortfolioName;
      if (this.newPortfolioName != '') {
        let endpoint = `/api/portfoliotemplates/${this.selectedPortfolio.id}/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", {
          name: this.newPortfolioName,
        }).then(data => {
          this.selectedPortfolio = data;
          this.newPortfolioName = "";
          const i = this.portfolios.findIndex(item => item.id === data.id);
          this.portfolios.splice(i,0,data);
        });
      }
    },
    addPortfolio(data){
      this.selectedPortfolio = data;
      this.getPortfolios();
    },
    deletePortfolio(data) {
      const i = this.portfolios.findIndex(item => item.id === data.id);
      this.$delete(this.portfolios,i)
      this.investments = [];
    },
    setPercentage(event, investment) {
      if (investment.id) {
        //for existing investments
        const i = this.investments.findIndex(item => item.id === investment.id);
        this.investments[i].percentage = event/100;
      } else if (investment.percentage) {
        //for new investments that have a percentage property
        this.newInvestment.percentage = event/100
      } else {
        //for new investments
        this.$set(this.newInvestment, 'percentage', event/100)
      }
    },
    getPercentage(investment) {
      if (investment.percentage) {
        return (investment.percentage*100).toFixed(2);
      } else {
        return null
      }
    },
    getInvestmentList() {
      let endpoint = `/api/investmentname/`;
      apiService(endpoint, "GET").then(data => {
        this.investmentList = data.results;
      });
    },
    addToChanged(investment) {
      if (!(this.changeList.includes(investment))) {
        this.changeList.push(investment);
      } else {
        const i = this.changeList.findIndex(item => item.id === investment.id);
        this.changeList.splice(i, 1);
        this.changeList.push(investment);
      }
    },
    getPortfolios() {
      let endpoint = `/api/portfoliotemplates/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.portfolios = data.results;
      });
    },
    getInvestments() {
      if (this.portfolioID != null) {
        let endpoint = `/api/portfoliotemplates/${this.portfolioID}/investments/`;
        apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
          this.investments = data.results;
        });
      };
    },
    addInvestment() {
      if (this.newInvestment.investment_name) {
        let endpoint = `/api/portfoliotemplates/${this.portfolioID}/investments/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "POST", {
          investment_name_id: this.newInvestment.investment_name,
          portfolio: this.portfolioID,
          percentage: this.newInvestment.percentage,
        }).then(data => {
          this.investments.push(data);
          this.newInvestment.investment_name = null;
          this.newInvestment.percentage = null;
          });
        if (this.error) {
          this.error = null;
        }
      } else {
        this.error = "You must enter a name and amount for the new investment";
      }
    },
    onSubmit() {
      if (this.changeList) {
        for (let i=0; i < this.changeList.length; i++) {
          let endpoint = `/api/portfoliotemplates/${this.portfolioID}/investments/${this.changeList[i].id}/`;
          apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", {
            investment_name_id: this.changeList[i].investment_name.id,
            portfolio: this.portfolioID,
            percentage: this.changeList[i].percentage,
          }).then(data => {
            console.log(data);
          });
        };
      };
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getPortfolios();
    this.getInvestmentList();
    this.getInvestments();
  }
};
</script>
